bug.summary: Ctrl-enter not working in a text_area
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h1>Summary</denchmark-h>
For one of our users, this code isn't working: import streamlit as st x = st.text_area(‘Your text here’) st.write("Result: ", x) rajarsheem <denchmark-link:https://discuss.streamlit.io/t/ctr-enter-not-working/130>writes</denchmark-link> :
Hi, I am using a text_area and when I press ctrl+enter after typing, I am not getting the result. However, when I click outside the text area box, I see the “RUNNING” message followed by the result.
